jcr:content.jcr:description: Altra combines running with fitness culture in the Solstice FC-1. With FootShape™ comfort and Balanced Cushioning™, you’ll want these limited-edition shoes.
jcr:content.jcr:title: Altra® | Solstice FC-1

customhtml2.customHTML:
THE MISSION:

Fitness Culture is a global app-based workout program and gym headquartered in St. George, Utah that focuses on function, flexibility and aesthetic to drive their mission: To create workouts that allow athletes and competitors to reach their goals.

customhtml2_copy.customHTML:
THE COLLABORATION:

The Altra Solstice doesn’t only align with this mission, it helps people achieve it through the Altra Core 3: FootShape™, Balanced Cushioning and Fit4Her™ technology. Similarly, Fitness Culture emphasizes the importance of a balanced nutrition, flexibility and strength while encompassing a full look at all aspects of fitness.
The limited-edition Altra Solstice FC-1 features the unique black and blue Fitness Culture colorway.

customhtml2_copy_cop.customHTML: Like every Altra shoe, the Solstice FC-1 is built on a Balanced Cushioning platform that positions the heel and forefoot at an equal distance from the ground. This natural foundation cultivates optimal alignment, better form and a low-impact landing.

customhtml2.customHTML: Altra’s unique FootShape™ toe box allows your toes to relax and spread out naturally, enhancing stability and strength while lifting and aiding proper alignment for natural running form.

image.alt: Altra's Limited Edition Solstice FC-1 Gym Shoe
